attributes.action: make it an offense to financially discriminate against consumers for either payment with cash or for the low utilisation of a necessity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make it an offense to :-

Financially discriminate against cash customers.

Provide a service at a lower rate than that which would be charged to a customer paying in cash.

Financially discriminate against savers as opposed to other consumers.

Financially discriminate against consumers for connection to or access to an essential service or necessity (banking, power, communication, water, transport, food etc) because of a low rate of consumption.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Direct-Debits/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
